# AWESOMEPACKAGE

Simple python package.

# How To Use The Package

1. Install The Package
    ```shell
    pip install awesomepyutil==0.0.1
    ```
2. Use `Arithmetic Operations`
    ```shell
    from arithmetic_ops.arithmetic_operations import func_divide

    out = func_divide(5,2)
    print(f"out: {out}")

    # Out: 2.5
    ```
